title: So i got Hextech Annie
body: Right so I've been playing league for a year or so now i have a few skins and I would be able to roughly work out how much it's worth, however, I got hextech annie in a hextech chest and unlocked it today (hate me below, i don't even play annie) and I'm just wondering based on just having this skin alone roughly how much is my account worth if i was to sell it??

replies.body: well if you would try and sell it, your account would be banned. Its against Riots terms and conditions to sell.
I know that, I'm not going to sell it im just asking roughly how much it's worth given how rare the skin is.
I would say around $600 Because Pax TF was around $900-$1200 but there were only about 10,000 of it while annie on the other hand is rare but can still be obtains/ easier to get than pax TF

$0.00, nothing, nada, zilch.

Your account has no equivilent in any currency, regardless of the amount spent on it. It isn't even your account to begin with, it's Riots.

A grand total of either $0.00 or probably some kind of scam charge because it's against the rules and will be banned so if you sell a banned account I'm sure that can qualify for some kind of sue or courthouse business, if not then scam away!

Look at these fking white nights, you can sell an account despite what your daddy Riot will have you believe. No one gives a fk about riots terms and conditions and this game is dieing and becoming hated because they'd rather ban people for saying "fuck" too much rather then fix legitimate issues, such as, the game being complete and utter garbage.
